original_text: Those people will soon disappear, like clothes that moths have eaten, like wool that worms have eaten. But I will always rule with righteousness. I will keep my people safe for ever.’ Those people will soon disappear, like clothes that moths have eaten, like wool that worms have eaten. But I will always rule with righteousness. I will keep my people safe for ever.’ Those people will soon disappear,
korean_text: 옷 같이 좀이 그들을 먹을 것이며 양털 같이 좀벌레가 그들을 먹을 것이나 나의 공의는 영원히 있겠고 나의 구원은 세세에 미치리라

sentences.original_text: like clothes that moths have eaten
like wool that worms have eaten
But I will always rule with righteousness
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나는 항상 의로움으로 다스릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: I will keep my people safe for ever
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 백성을 영원히 안전하게 지킬 것입니다
